Locations.Name: Farmer's Field
Locations.Description: There are rows of corn here, with giant rats hiding between them.

Locations.Name: Farmer's House
Locations.Description: This is the house of your neighbor, Farmer Ted.

Locations.Name: Trading Shop
Locations.Description: The shop of Susan, the trader.

Locations.Name: Town Gate
Locations.Description: There is a gate here, protecting the town from giant spiders.

Locations.Name: Spider Forest
Locations.Description: The trees in this forest are covered with spider webs.

Locations.Name: Herbalist's Hut
Locations.Description: You see a small hut, with plants drying from the roof.

Locations.Name: Herbalist's Garden
Locations.Description: There are many plants here, with snakes hiding behind them.
